title: 3 Simple Ways to Change a Video Format to MP4

steps.title: Download and install VLC player.
steps.content: Download and install VLC player. VLC Player is a free, open-source video player that can play any video format. It can also convert your video files into the MP4 format. You can download VLC from videolan.org . It is available for any OS.

steps.title: Click the "Media" menu in VLC Player and select "Convert / Save".
steps.content: Click the "Media" menu in VLC Player and select "Convert / Save". This will launch the conversion tool.

steps.title: Click the .
steps.content: Click the . Add... button and select the video. You can load videos of almost any format. Click Convert / Save once you've selected your file(s).

steps.title: Select "Video – H.264 + MP3 (MP4)" from the "Profile" menu.
steps.content: Select "Video – H.264 + MP3 (MP4)" from the "Profile" menu. This will tell VLC to convert the file into the MP4 format. You can click the Settings button to adjust the settings. Most users can leave them at default.

steps.title: Click the .
steps.content: Click the . Browse... button and save the output file. This will be the final converted file. Make sure you name it something you'll recognize.

steps.title: Click the .
steps.content: Click the . Start button and wait. The conversion process will take as long as the original video. This is because VLC plays the video and re-records it as MP4. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Download and install Handbrake.
steps.content: Download and install Handbrake. Handbrake is a free, open-source video conversion program for any OS. You can download Handbrake from handbrake.fr . You can use Handbrake to convert nearly any video into the MP4 format.

steps.title: Use Handbrake to open the video file.
steps.content: Use Handbrake to open the video file. Launch Handbrake and click the "Source" button. Select "File" and then browse for the video file.

steps.title: Select "Default" from the "Presets" panel.
steps.content: Select "Default" from the "Presets" panel. Click the "Presets" menu and select "Show Preset Panel" if you don't see it. The "Default" preset will work on any computer. You can select specific devices from the "Devices" list.

steps.title: Click the "Browse" button to set the output file.
steps.content: Click the "Browse" button to set the output file. You'll need to name and save the converted file before you start. Make sure you save it somewhere you can find it. Make sure "mp4" is selected in the "Save as type" menu.

steps.title: Click "Add to Queue" and then "Start".
steps.content: Click "Add to Queue" and then "Start". Handbrake will begin converting your video to MP4 format. The conversion process can take anywhere from a few minutes to over an hour. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Consider the limitations.
steps.content: Consider the limitations. If you use a conversion website you'll need to upload the video first. Even if the conversion website doesn't have a size limitation (and many do), the upload process alone could take hours. If you have a long video file to convert, consider using Handbrake or VLC .

steps.title: Visit a conversion site.
steps.content: Visit a conversion site. Popular conversion sites include: https://cloudconvert.com/mp4-converter https://www.freeconvert.com/mp4-converter zamzar.com

steps.title: Upload your video file.
steps.content: Upload your video file. Click the button to select a file on your computer. Some sites may allow you to select files stored in Dropbox or Google Drive. The upload process may take a long time to complete.

steps.title: Select your Output format.
steps.content: Select your Output format. Most conversion sites allow you to select from a variety of outputs. Make sure that you have "MP4" selected.

steps.title: Wait for the video to convert.
steps.content: Wait for the video to convert. Once you have uploaded the video, you'll need to wait for it to convert. The time it takes to convert varies from site to site. The size of the video will affect conversion times. You'll either be shown or emailed a download link when it's finished.
